entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET console logging uses a blocking collection which is not optimal for cloud-native applications #65264
    7.0.0
  • Hostfxr.dll load failure with arm64 app on arm64 Windows 11 host #65263
  • Libraries Infrastructure and Tools work planned for .NET 7 #65260
  • Disabling runtime marshaling broke DomainControllerTests.FindAll_NoSuchName_ReturnsEmpty() #65259
  • Make yml AzDO tasks more robust by leveraging the new task retry features #65258
  • Optimize Math.Min/Max byte-overloads #65255
  • Getting file descriptor count on macOS throws #65254
  • Contention in coreclr.dll!EventPipeBufferManager::AllocateBufferForThread #65247
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `remainder by zero` crash in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests`, on browser #65245
  • [wasm][windows] Runtime assertion in `System.Threading.Channels.Tests` #65244
  • [wasm] Interpreter crash in `System.Text.Json` tests #65243
  • [wasm][aot] `memory access out of bounds` crash in `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests` with `v8` #65242
  • System.Xml.Tests.CNameTableTestModule.RunTests failure on Windows Server 2022 #65235
  • File Position in Memory vs. Append File #65234

Closed

  • [linux][arm64] Assert failure: 'regNum >= 0 && regNum <= 30' at gcinfodecoder.cpp #65175
  • Remove `ParameterInfo.HasDefaultValue` workaround #65233
  • [wasm] Avoid running work items for test suites that are not supported on browser #65210
    7.0.0
  • [mono] Tests failing with error: Invalid IL code in (wrapper native-to-managed) System.Runtime.InteropServices.PosixSignalRegistration:HandlerRoutine (int): IL_0049: ret #65177

PullRequests

Created

  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Logging` #65262
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • `ZeroObj` assertions #65257
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a mono warning on linux arm64 #65256
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Optimize and clean-up `System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator`. #65251
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • Use SSA def descriptors in copy propagation #65250
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not reorder HTTP header values #65249
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Respect single target framework values in slngen.targets #65248
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Validate `IntPtr` and ByRef field overlap #65246
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Implement StringWriter composite formatting overloads. #65241
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve regex code gen for non-backtracking repeaters #65240
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Change SslStream's internal adapter interface to use static abstract interface methods #65239
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Avoid Attribute.GetCustomAttributes() returning null for open generic type #65237
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [No Review] Trying Server 2022 in main pipeline #65236
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Don't report ZR reg to GC #65253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable tests on Debug CoreClr that are already disabled on Checked CoreClr #64891
    area-Meta
  • Fix nullability in `IOptionsMonitor` #65225
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • Captures support for NonBacktracking #65129
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Obsolete and put SerializationFormat.Binary behind an appcontext switch #65139
    area-System.Data
  • Don't use Targets* helper properties in libs #64500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Disable System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generators.Tests #65238
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • Store the result in the return local in native-to-managed IL stubs. #65203
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, runtime-mono
  • Convert over StandardOleMarshalObject to use either source-generated or manual interop. #65226
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-windows
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65216
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update Maui/Mobile pre.py's and disable android due to AOT Issue #65231
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in InteropSyncBlock for ComWrappers map. #65214
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Disable tests using external TLS1.2 server on win7 #65188
    area-System.Net
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #64999

Updated

  • Improve incremental build times of the libraries subset #64000
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Optimize Math.Round(x, MidpointRounding.AwayFromZero/ToEven) #64016
    area-System.Numerics
  • [WIP] Heuristic change for double constant adjustment #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update the ConvertToGeneratedDllImport code-fix to support stripping out PreserveSig and transforming the signature when PreserveSig was set to true #65169
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Move Msquic over to Source-generated delegate interop. #65204
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Treat TZCNT/POPCNT/LZCNT as never negative #64951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT] Add MonoApi runtime tests #65221
    * NO MERGE *
  • [build] Move Mono API headers to src/native/monoapi #64569
    area-Build-mono
  • Improve vectorization of String.Split #64899
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Send CA names on Linux #65195
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Remove the Unix code from `System.Drawing.Common`. #64623
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [draft][wasm] JSImport/JSExport prototype #64493
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Do not hoist constants if they will not be CSEed #64039
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix missing zero-offset sequences and add checking #64805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not number partial definitions and `ARGPLACE` nodes #64898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle direct addresses for statics in `IsFieldAddr` #64846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use a simpler representation for array addresses after morph #64581
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Use TimeSpan everywhere we use an int for seconds, milliseconds, and timeouts (Group 1/3) #64860
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: DirectoryInfo.CopyTo / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rationalize wasm jobs run on CI #65035
    NO REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix (chrome|edge)://inspect for the debug proxy #65219
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.4
  • [wasm][workload] Try to figure out how to support aot on net6.0 with a net7.0 sdk #61716
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [tests][eventpipe] Port over Dotnet/Diagnostics to enable eventpipe tests on Android #64358
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Disable multiple tests failing in R2R-CG2 legs #65227
  • Use SECPKG_ATTR_REMOTE_CERT_CHAIN to retrieve server cert during handshake #65134
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating wasm stack traces via XHarness #65167
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Morph `Vector.Create(0)` to `Vector.Zero` #63821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] debugging some crashes #65178
    NO REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use C# 10's enhanced struct initialization features #63131
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Use StartsWith in regex compiler / source gen for shorter strings #65222
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Use `--emit-symbol-map` to generate a `dotnet.js.symbols` #65162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
